about.3: Idea developed for fun while browsing the IKEA Nagasandra Store.
bildval.desc: Guess what picture matches the given product name.
bildval.easy.desc: Guess only the most popular products!
bildval.how_to_play.desc.1: You will be given an IKEA product name. Pick the picture that best identifies the product.
bildval.how_to_play.desc.2: There are {{rounds}} rounds. Each round, you will be given a new name to identify.
bildval.how_to_play.desc.3: If you are stuck, you can pass/skip the round. You have {{passes}} passes per game.
bildval.how_to_play.multiplier: Multiplier increases by 1 each round if you succeed, max {{max}}. If you fail, the multiplier resets to 1.
bildval.how_to_play.title: Bildval: How to play
bildval.question: What is... {{product}}?
bildval.title: Bildval
common.desc: Ordspel: A fun collection of word games based on products from the IKEA range
common.disclaimer: Ordspel is a free and open-source project based on publicly available information and media from IKEA.com hosted on GitHub, and is not approved by or affiliated with Inter IKEA Systems B.V.
common.ikeadle.desc: Wordle, but with IKEA products. Play over at {{link}}.
common.share.desc: Check out these silly IKEA word games!
common.title: Ordspel
faq.a.1: A collection of simple word games based on IKEA product names. Ordspel is just Swedish for "word game".
faq.a.2: Because, why not! It's fun, isn't it? Don't tell me I wasted a lot of hours!
faq.a.3: Select on the game you want to play and follow the instructions, it's that simple!
faq.a.4: Use the selector in the footer.
faq.a.5: Just basic events for game analytics, no personal data is collected.
faq.a.6: Please open an issue or a PR on <github>GitHub</github>.
faq.q.1: What even is this? What kind of name is Ordspel!
faq.q.2: But why make an entire game of IKEA products?
faq.q.4: How do I change the language?
faq.q.6: Uhh, I maybe found a bug?
faq.q.7: How do I get in touch?
jumble.desc: Form a word from the given letters to match an IKEA product.
jumble.easy.desc: Guess only the most popular products!
jumble.how_to_play.desc.1: You will be given a scrambled IKEA product name. Unscramble the letters to guess the product.
jumble.how_to_play.desc.2: There are {{rounds}} rounds. Each round, you will be given a new product to guess.
jumble.how_to_play.desc.3: You have {{attempts}} attempts to guess the product in each round. The faster you guess, the more points you will score. The game will reveal the description and image of the product as you use up your attempts.
jumble.how_to_play.desc.4: If you are stuck, you can pass/skip the round. You have {{passes}} passes per game.
jumble.how_to_play.multiplier: Multiplier increases by 1 each round if you succeed, max {{max}}. If you fail, the multiplier resets to 1.
jumble.how_to_play.round_scores: Round score is {{g0}} for guessing without hints, {{g1}} for guessing after the description is revealed, and {{g2}} for guessing after the image is revealed.
jumble.how_to_play.title: Jumble: How to play
jumble.title: Jumble
ordval.desc: Guess what product best matches the given description.
ordval.easy.desc: Guess only the most popular products!
ordval.how_to_play.desc.1: You will be given a description of an IKEA product. Pick the name that best matches with the description.
ordval.how_to_play.desc.2: There are {{rounds}} rounds. Each round, you will be given a new product to identify.
ordval.how_to_play.desc.3: If you are stuck, you can pass/skip the round. You have {{passes}} passes per game.
ordval.how_to_play.multiplier: Multiplier increases by 1 each round if you succeed, max {{max}}. If you fail, the multiplier resets to 1.
ordval.how_to_play.title: Ordval: How to play
ordval.question: What is a "{{product}}"?
ordval.title: Ordval
vadarjag.desc: Vad-Ã¤r-jag or "What am I". Find out what IKEA product you are!
vadarjag.placeholder: Enter your name or a word or something
vadarjag.title: Vadarjag
vadarjag.what_is_this.desc.1: This gives the closest IKEA product to the entered name.
vadarjag.what_is_this.desc.2: That's it, nothing fancy or AI generated or anything.
vadarjag.what_is_this.title: Vadarjag: What is this?
